name: lmicinv
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0

stmt.origin: mpbird(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c1), wcel(c1, c6))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
-| wi(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c1), wcel(c1, c6)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
-| wi(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c1), wcel(c1, c6)))

stmt.origin: lmiinv(c0, c1, c6, c2, c3, c4, c5, c7, w0)
stmt.pretty: lmiinv(c0, c1, c6, c2, c3, c4, c5, c7, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c1), wcel(c1, c6)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cstrkgld, nat2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(clmi, c3), c6))
-| wceq(c7, cfv(clng, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c6, crn(c7)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →((c0 ` c1)= c1 ↔ c1 ∈ c6))
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ c4 =(dist ` c3)
⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c3)
⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
⊣ (w0 → c3[TarskiGDim> =]2)
⊣ c0 =((lInvG ` c3)` c6)
⊣ c7 =(LineG ` c3)
⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ ran(c7))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cstrkgld, nat2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(clmi, c3), c6))
-| wceq(c7, cfv(clng, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c6, crn(c7)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)= c1)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c6)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ c4 =(dist ` c3)
⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c3)
⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
⊣ (w0 → c3[TarskiGDim> =]2)
⊣ c0 =((lInvG ` c3)` c6)
⊣ c7 =(LineG ` c3)
⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ ran(c7))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)

comment: The mirroring line is an invariant. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Aug-2020.)
